snippet.title: Hyperspace Deck Command Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2711190/Hyperspace_Deck_Command/

Hyperspace Deck Command is a sci-fi card-battler roguelite. Deploy spaceships that operate on individual turn timers, combine a wide variety of starter packs and collectible cards into powerful decks and use dual purpose status effects to defeat the hegemonising swarm intelligence.

Press Kit: https://www.notion.so/Hyperspace-Deck-Command-a151ae2e8888412aa92db982f2cc284f?showMoveTo=true
